pros: Get to take care of Awesome patients

Turnover
Managers don’t care about you

job_title: Director in Panama City, FL
pros: Many good qualities as a company. HCA really took care of all employees after the hurricane. They ensured everyone had a safe place to live, kept all employees whole as far as pay/job was concerned. Health Benefits are good. PTO accrual was good. There are some really great people that work tin his facility.
cons: Work-Life Balance is nonexistent. Work 12-14 hours and still could not get caught up on call 24/7 no uninterrupted weekends or vacations Pay is below the norm. Raises are minimal. Executives make multi-millions and get multi-million bonuses, staff at facility level get very tiny raises (2% or less). Very difficult to explain / support during evals time. Evals are not performance based but the same across the board. This does not reward the High Performers.

job_title: Emergency Department RN in Panama City, FL
pros: GCRMC is very enthusiastic about furthering education. They offer tuition reimbursement.
cons: Numbers and times appear to have greater importance than the consideration of patient care. Patient care is very important to administration, but it does not appear to be the lead concern.

review_title: Profits First! Be glad you have a job.
